item.title: todo book
item.description: 09:46 Friday 10 August 2018 JST I bought a book that has become my todo book. It’s as portable as my phone and even more reliable in terms of battery power. I bought it on Tuesday and have used it daily since then. Wow four days in total. So far I have used a single page per day. (It’s 91mm x 160mm x 6mm, featuring 96 pages and two covers within the 6mm thickness.

item.title: Finally sent book back to Margaret
item.description: 16:32 Tuesday 11 July 2017 JST I finally got Margaret’s book on its way back to her. She lent it to me years ago.. like 8 years and said she would like to have it back sometime.. and then our group ended and she left the country. Funny that after I reached her and got her address yesterday, I suddenly had the desire to read the book to my GG class.

item.title: Received Rollerdog from Krimms
item.description: 16:57 Thursday 28 May 2015 JST I received via snail mail the hardcopy version of Rollerdog I purchased from Krimms. It looks beautiful in its pristine packaging. I haven’t opened it yet, and probably won’t open it until further notice… though I’ll email him and ask if there’s anything he put in the book specifically for me.

item.title: book review The Last
item.description: 17:45 Sunday 03 May 2015 JST I just finished Mike’s latest book, The Last. It’s a really interesting story set in the real world, just three years from now. Quite an easy read except for the queasy parts which I almost had to put down! The story leaves some unanswered questions, and lends itself to more books, which I hope he writes soon! I was surprised by the plot twists; it seemed so simple at first!
